de.propra2.ausleiherino24.web

Class CaseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.propra2.ausleiherino24.web.CaseController

  • @Controller
public class CaseController
extends java.lang.Object
    'CaseController' handles all requests Case-related. This includes booking of articles (and therefore case creation), accepting/declining requests, returning articles (case closing) and customer reviews.
